section.style: padding-top:70px; padding-bottom:60px; background-size: cover; min-height:px; background-color:#f7f7f7;

hr.h2: It’s a great day to be a Husky!

p.strong: Aurora Public Schools and thank you for viewing our website! We are so fortunate to have great students, supportive parents, awesome alumni and unbelievable patron support within our District. The Husky Staff is consistently working to provide the best blended educational experience for all of our students. Our team members at the preschool, elementary, middle, and high school believe all students can learn when provided an emotionally, intellectually and physically safe environment. Our culture is based on our positive attitudes and a solid foundation of hope, faith and service. I am proud to say Aurora Public Schools makes this commitment every day!

section.style: padding-top:20px; padding-bottom:px; background-size: cover; min-height:px; background-color:#f7f7f7;

div.p: Aurora Public Schools will be conducting a school census during the month of June. Please complete either the Online Census Questionnaire via DocHub or Download Census Questionnaire and return to the school Superintendent’s Office by May 15, 2019, 300 L Street, Aurora NE 68818 – kvaught@4rhuskies.org– fax 402-694-5097. For the Online Questionnaire, click the URL link to open form, click Fill a Copy, sign in to DocHub, agree to the electronic record, and click Let’s Do this. Once the form is completed, click FINISH in the right corner to submit the form. Thank you, and should you have any questions, please contact Kim Vaught at 402-694-6923 opt 5 or APSCensus@4rhuskies.org.

div.div: © 2019 AURORA PUBLIC SCHOOLS. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
